name: "Azeroth's Greatest BEE.E.O." Cap
description: This item was, in fact, "passed down" from the previous BEE.E.O..

effects.display_string: Set: Disintegrate damage increased by 6% and Pyre damage increased by 6%.
(4) Set: Eternity Surge and Shattering Star's cooldowns are decreased by 1.0 sec and Eternity Surge now grants Essence Burst.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cosmic Gladiator's Chain Monnion

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Fashion nearby garbage into a sphere and launch it into the sky. After 3 sec of gathering momentum the sphere crashes into the targeted location dealing 1.9 million Physical damage split between all enemies in the area. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 894 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 894 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.
